1.content:
First thing's first; what kind of relationship do men have with the much bigger women?

1) Men and women are equals in society. Neither group treats the other unfairly, and society has made many adaptations to aid the smaller males in their daily lives. Women also have evolved with superior eye sight and hearing, among other things, to make daily interaction with males easier. Basically, this route is as close to real-life society as we're going to get in this story...

2) Basically the same as option 1, except males aren't given the opportunity to get any jobs or have a say in government matters. Instead, they serve the roles of stay-at-home parents and handle the housework once they reach that age. Other than the fact that jobs won't hire them, men are basically treated the same as women.

3) Think of the ethics in this route as being similar to the middle ages, where society was divided into classes based on social standing. Men are the poor lower class and women are the wealthy upper class. Women don't go out of there way to oppress men, but they don't exactly try to help the either... They live in peace, more or less, but women are clearly favored by society.

4) Men are thought of as animals rather than humans. As such, they are commonly sold in pet stores or used as toys. Unlike many other giantess stories hat make men into pets, I want this route to remain mostly gentle. I'm fine with them getting punished for misbehavior; but remember that they are pets, not slaves. They should still be treated fairly well by their owners. Abusing them in this route would be like abusing a small puppy in real life: it's something that is frowned upon by society! Also, men found on the streets without an owner are treated like stray dogs and taken to a pet shelter or something similar.

5) Women see men the same way they see insects: something that only exists to be crushed. Men live oppressed lives and must live in constant fear of the much larger women. If a male is spotted by a female, they are either captured and kept as slaves or simply killed on the spot. Those who are kept as slaves are constantly abused, and may end up wishing that they had just been stomped out of existence. Life is anything but peaceful as far as males are concerned.

11.content:
Your name is Daniel Phillips, but everybody always called you Dan. You were an average 16 year old male, standing at a decent 5 feet 8 inches. You were fairly athletic, and lived with the rest of your family. Your 42 year old father Jack, your 35 year old mother Michelle, and your two sisters. Your 18 year old big sister Amanda (Amy), and your 12 year old little sister Cynthia (Cindy). Yes, your family was big, but that just made things more exciting.

Today was just like any other day. You were asleep on your bed in the specifically designed "male bedroom" in your house. Despite still being incredibly massive to accommodate female use, it was designed with special elevators that allowed males easy access to any section of the room. Your bed was located on top of a large table in the middle of the room. This table was actually your entire room, but in reality, it was all you needed. It was big enough for both you and your father to share. With a divider down the middle of the table to allow you both to have your privacy, a removable ceiling for a female family member to reach through and wake you up, and walls around the edges to prevent a lethal fall from occurring, You wouldn't even know it was just a table from the inside.

To a male, it was like a full master bedroom all on it's own. However, to one of the massive females, it was just a small island table in the middle of the room. Yep, that's how much bigger women are than men... In fact, the average woman is about 100 feet tall! Society has always been built to suit their greater stature, but it has also made several adaptations in order to allow the smaller males to fit in without struggle. Almost every subway or train line has a special track specifically built to be just the right size for men to feel comfortable in. Many rooms in buildings had smaller "male rooms" similar to your bedroom within them, and escalator-like devices were built all over the place to allow males to get from place to place easily. Basically, the entire male world was just add-on content to the female half of society.

However, despite having such superior size, females still recognized males as their equals. Many males still held important positions in major companies and even the government. In short, despite the obvious female superiority, nothing about this way of life was seen as strange. Men and women lived together as equals, and nobody ever questioned it. It was just the way things had always been.

It was at this point that your room was flooded with light as the roof was lifted off of your room. You looked up to see your 'little' sister Cindy smiling down at you.

"*yawn* Good morning Cindy... How are you doing today?"

"Good morning Dan! I'm good, thank you!"

Despite your sister's hyperactive attitude, her voice has adapted to speaking with the much smaller males without bursting their ears. This was actually just another one of the various biological adaptations that females have made over time. In order to make interaction with males easier, females have evolved in several ways to make interacting with males on a daily basis an easy task. Their muscles have become far more controlled, allowing them to gently pick up and interact physically with males without worry of causing harm. They have ultra keen eyesight to be able to see the men as they walk around the ground without worry of being stomped by an unaware giantess. Their mouths can instantly detect the taste of a male should one accidentally be eaten, and they will immediately spit them out. And lastly their ears had become just as highly sensitive as their eyes, allowing them to easily hear the voices of the smaller males. Basically, despite the overwhelming size difference, these adaptations make interaction with the giant women no different from interacting with someone of the same size.

"Well sis, I guess it's time to get started on another day... First thing's first though... You should probably wake dad up..."

"Ugh... Why does he always have to sleep in!"

"I think it's one of those 'old people' things."

Your sister then reached into your dad's side of the room and nudged him with her index finger.

"Wakey wakey, Dad! It's morning!"

Your dad then wakes up.

"*yawn* Ah, good morning Precious..."

"Mornin' Dad! Mom told me to wake you two up and bring you down before your breakfast gets cold!"

You suddenly burst in.

"My waffles are getting cold!? Crap! You can't reheat those! Hurry up sis!"

"*giggle* Oh bro, you and your waffles... Okay you two, hop on and I'll give you a lift."

Cindy then placed one hand on each side of the divider. You and your father both jumped onto her hands, and she quickly lifted you both up and placed you each on her shoulders.

"Now hurry sis! My waffles are waiting!"

Yes, it's true. Your breakfast waffles were one of your favorite foods in the world, and you absolutely HATED for them to get cold. Your sister then walked down stairs and into the kitchen. She placed you and your father next to a specially sized table on the counter. You quickly sat down and started eating your waffles. Your sister stood behind you giggling the whole time. She always loved to watch how excited you got over your breakfast. You had just finished when your mother and older sister entered the room.

"Hey mom!"

"Good morning Daniel. What plans do you have for today?"

"Well..."

1122.content:
Minutes of the day go by, and you couldn’t be more happier. Here you are on your favorite couch, watching your favorite show called “Downsized”, a show about a miniature detective that must work with his giant female partner/lover to solve crimes and bring criminals to justice. Truly this is how you wanted to spend you weekend, doing nothing but relaxing, the only thing that would make it better is if your loving sister Cindy could stop kicking your chair with back breaking THUMPS that seemed to keep getting harder and harder with each passing moment. Cindy wasn’t actually kicking your seat of course, you knew that if Cindy really had kicked your seat, the seat along with your body would be torn to shreds, no in actuality she was tapping against your seat using nothing but her big toe. This wasn’t even a fraction of Cindy's power.

“Cindy do me a favor and stop kicking my seat.” You said keeping your eyes on the TV.

“Daniel I’m bored.” Cindy said with a small groan.

You loved your sister with all of your heart, but even she had her moments when she got on your nerves. This was one of those moments. Cindy was one of those people that needed to be entertained, and couldn’t keep still for to long. Cindy of course did not like the kind of TV shows you liked so asking her to sit down and be quit while you watched TV was out of the question. There was only one thing you could do to appease her constant need for entertainment.

“Ok, ok what game do you want to play this time?” You said as you got up from off the miniature couch that stood on the coffee table and walked towards Cindy with a tolerant smile on your face.

Cindy with a smile on her gigantic face picks your miniature sized body up from off the coffee table with her left hand. Cindy brings you up to her face, with her right hand stroking her chin as if she was lost in thought

“How about we play......”
1122.title: Cindy gets bored and begins to kick your seat.

11223.content:
Your heart seemed to stop for a brief second, of course Your 12 year old sister, Cindy had to pick the worst and most dangerous game imaginable. Slay the Dragon 🐉.

“Do we have to play that game Cindy?” You ask trying to get your sister to change her mind.

You absolutely hated the game Slay the dragon. It was a game you would always lose, because it was essentially you the gallant knight, up against your gigantic sister, the monstrous dragon. Yea the dragon would always win, easily.

“Oh come on Daniel I’ll go easy on you.” Cindy says with pleading 🥺 eyes.

You of course didn’t believe your sister, simply because this wasn’t the first time she said she would take it easy on you, she always failed to do so, and yet those puppy dog eyes always seemed to work on you.

“Ok, ok, but seriously take it easy.” You said rubbing your head.

“Don’t worry I’ll take it easy on you.” Cindy says putting you on the floor.

Cindy standing on her two feet towers over you. Cindy steps over you with booming foot steps as she walks inside your room to get the objects necessary to play the game. It always amazed you how tall girls where, the power they possessed in their little finger was more power than you hand in your whole entire body. The more you thought about it the more you dreaded playing the up coming game. The ground once again begins to rumble alerting you that Cindy was returning to the living room.

Cindy stepping into the living room has a tiny plastic sword and a piece of small yellow string Inside her right hand. Cindy walking towards you gets down on one knee and rest her right hand on the ground right in front of you with her hand wide open. You carefully climb her massive fingers and upon reaching the top walk to the center of Cindy’s hand. Cindy was looking down at you with a smile on her face, being patient and very careful not to move. You suspected that your little sister always had a little thrill when it came to carrying you, you didn’t really mind, you of course where use to it.

Upon reaching the center of your sisters hand you grab the plastic sword 🗡 and rap the piece of string around your waist. It was almost laughable, the plastic sword was huge to you, but to your sister it could barely be considered a tooth pick, the same could be said for the piece of string around your waist, it was long and really thick to you, it to your sister it was so small and fragile. You had a feeling you weren’t going to win this game.

“Your going to need this too brother.” Cindy says from above.

Cindy’s left hand moves closer towards you, so close that if you didn’t know your sister to well you would have believed that she was about to crush you, but you new your sister would never hurt you, so you had no fear. Cindy’s left hand opens up from right above your head and something drops down right beside you. You looking down at the fleshy ground see head gear and a chest guard. These where two things that were more important than the sword and yellow string that you carried.

“Thanks sis, we can’t play without these.” You say putting on the equipment.

“No problem, we don’t need you getting hurt now do we?” Cindy says with a small giggle.

Cindy seeing that your where done changing puts you down on the carpet floor, and while on her hands and knees backs away from you until she was at least a mile (from your perspective) away from you.

While looking at your gigantic sister you think of a strategy. The rules to the game where simple. Their was two ways of winning for the knight. The first way, which was the easiest way, was to wrap the yellow string around the dragon, the second way which was the hardest way, was to actually defeat the dragon in physical combat. It of course goes without saying, you where going for option 1, but even that had its own problems. The string although big for you, was very small compared to your sisters massive body. It would only fit around a finger Or one of your sisters toes, two fingers max. The only way for Cindy to win the game is if you either forfeit the match or, if she takes the yellow string away from you for 1 whole hour. Either way she would be coming after you so it was almost impossible for you to wrap the yellow string around her body. You had to come up with something

Cindy on her hands and knees stares at you with excitement. This truly was her favorite game. You just didn’t really understand why.

“Are you ready?” Cindy asks with a wide smaller on her face.

“Are you sure you don’t want to watch TV.” You ask trying to find a way out of this.

“Let the games begin!” Cindy yells, the vibrations of her shout almost knocking you off your feet.

“I guess that’s a no.”

13.content:
In this world, the two genders were divided by their class. Women, who are the rich upper class, lived their lives in the lap of luxury without ever having anything to worry about. Men, however, lived their lives in the poverty of the lower class. Men are constantly living on the streets in this broken world, and many of them are forced to commit various crimes just to make enough money to survive. However, things weren't all bad. While women rarely would go out of their way to help males, at least they didn't go out of their way to harm them either. You see, in this world, the average female grows to be about 100 feet tall. If they wanted to, they could easily have driven the entire male race into extinction long ago. As things stood now, the two genders lived in a relative peace. Males and females generally didn't try to actively contact each other unless it was necessary, so the majority of society was divided.

That is, until now anyway...

You had recently run into young woman named Koyuki Sena, an attractive 15 year old girl with slightly spiked dark blue hair, fairly pale skin, and an a slender body. Through a complex chain of events that even you yourself didn't fully understand, Koyuki had taken a liking to you and decided to hire you as her new servant. You were now on your way to her home, where you had agreed to serve her various needs in exchange for much-needed money. Luckily for you, Koyuki was very generous with how much she payed the men working for her.

You had just reached her massive mansion, which was easily taller than any other building in the entire city. You were just amazed by how tall it was, and the fact that only a single girl was living there practically blew your mind. Apparently, Koyuki's mother was one of the richest women in the entire city, and her recent death meant that Koyuki had inherited her vast fortune. Like most men in the world, you weren't able to afford the price of going to college, so you had expected that you would end up working minimum wage. However, as luck would have it, Koyuki was ready and willing to pay you massively.


As you ring the doorbell, you new employer opens the door and looks down at you with a smile. She then invited you into her mansion, where you would be spending many of your days from now on, and proceeded to tell you what your first job would be...
13.title: A heavy divide.

choices: "We should get some rest. You must be pretty tired from the walk over here."

"I'm getting hungry. Let's go get something to eat together."
135.content:
Koyuki lifts you up and places you on her shoulder before walking back into her mansion. From this position, you couldn't help admiring the incredible scenery. You had to be careful to hold on to her shirt tightly, as each step the massive girl took caused the ground below you to tremble. She was wearing a gray shirt with a smiley face and blue shorts. You knew that Koyuki was a fairly nice girl based on your very first meeting with her, but the fact remained that she was a girl, and her sheer size was enough to intimidate you slightly. You were originally quite worried that she would step on you with her massive bare feet, but this fear was alleviated a you learned that she could easily see you even from a far ways off. She walked slowly and carefully so that you were able to stay at a safe distance.

After a bit of walking, Koyuki arrived in her bedroom. Smiling, she picked you up off her shoulder between her thumb and index finger before placing you down on her bed. She then sat down next to you and began to speak.

"I'm glad to see that you're willing to accept my offer and work for me. As I'm sure you already know, my name is Koyuki Sena. Just so you know, I am actually quite the genius, so I tend to spend a lot of time working in my lab. You, my lucky little friend, have been chosen by me to live with me in this mansion. I chose you because I'll be needing your help to accomplish... Well, a few different things. I'll see to it that anything you could ever need or desire will be provided for you here, so I hope you will enjoy working for me. I, as you know, am rich enough to buy whatever I want, so don't worry about anything. If you should ever need anything, please don't hesitate to ask. As for my rules, they are pretty simple: just follow my directions and don't leave this building without my explicit say-so. Now, do we have a deal?"

You simply nodded your head. You had no other prospects for the future, and thus you had nothing to lose.

"Good". She smiled. "Now..."

15.content:
You awake to the commonplace sounds of the M District's morning commute. Sitting up to yawn and stretch, you glance around the room as the groggy film over your mind begins to wane. Sunlight streams in through your lone unshaded window, spilling over your bedroom in a bright arc. According to your alarm clock (which, for the first time in a while, didn't give you the urge to smash it) it was about time you woke up. The quality of your sleep was unusually good, so you weren't reluctant to get out of bed this time.

After all, it was a Friday.

That meant you might be able to find some good scraps today. From your neighborhood (if it could be called such) there was usually a good turnout of discarded food debris and remains, every edible piece of which was scavenged and stored by the residents of the M District. M stood for male, and it was a region of the city which housed the dowtrodden of the species and kept them free of conflagration (at least most of the time) with women.

Being at quite a diminutive disadvantage by their gender, males clung to what little land they had and survived, and had done so for generations. Much of the city was built to house the larger of the species, and it was the obligation of the M District to navigate through a tunnel network below the city's streets in order to avoid contact and, likely by extension, a fatal end. It wasn't a rose garden, but it was a life. Besides, it had always been this way for you.


What happens to you next?

151.content:
You got into your normal clothes for the day and started to head off outside of your house and into the M District downtown area where all the scraps are. The city looked like it was been through an doomsday event as many things were destroyed. Cars were without doors and just an inferior version of themselves, the buildings look like they are rotting out of existence as they get older and older over the years. Pretty much so, the females turned this place into a wasteland.

You venture to downtown via the subway system to get to the downtown area so you can eat and drink for the day, when you got there… you see a bunch of people picking up their food and drinks for the day. You picked your share up, with is just raw meat and a water bottle. Then you head to a fireplace and cook your meat, then ate it. You know how to survive in an environment like this, and you needed your skills in order to survive in this world as the females basically have control of the M District.

Suddenly a 11 year old female with pale skin, red hair, and green eyes started the approach the area, and the males began to blow down to them and give them their prayers as it was not only a policy that they do this every day when a female enters the area, they bow down to them and give them praise as they conquer the world. If they didn’t, they would suffer the wrath of the Goddesses, and the M District would be nearly destroyed by their rampage. You complied and bow down and prayed to them, afterwards, the girl left.

The females placed strict rules upon the men, like the prayer on, they have to work for them everyday at their specific job if they want cash to move up the ranks and improve their style of living. Another rule is that they have to be in their homes by sundown as the giantesses do their night searches for anyone outside for any reason, and if they were caught… they would either be killed, or brought into the Arena.

In terms of living, you were rich, but you decided to help out the people by giving all your money to them, and you live dirt poor, as you feel that hard work pays off at the end. Besides, they were suffering… so why not you can help as well.

The sun was starting to go down, and?
151.title: Life in the M District

choices: You find a hiding place quickly, and manage to avoid being seen by her.

1512.content:
As the law of the M-District was set by the females, men were strictly forbidden from being outside their homes at night. They must not go outside their homes for any reason whatsoever, and any females who catch a male breaking curfew have the rights to kill the male on sight. If you were caught by a female at night, you would either be taken home by the female and kept as their slave, or be killed on the spot. Whatever the result, it wouldn't be anything good for you.

Sadly, you weren’t lucky enough to get back to your home in time. You worked far away, and the traffic while trying to get back home before sunset was terrible. Once the curfew time had been reached, all the homes in the M-District were automatically put into lockdown for the night. In the end, you found yourself trapped outside. At the moment, you were the only one that wasn't inside. The moon was now up, and one of the female guards had arrived to do the nightly sweep of the city to make sure nobody was left outside. Every step she took with her massive feet made the ground rumble, and you shivered in fear knowing that sooner or later she would find you.

As you looked up at this giantess, you could see that she was a 15 year old girl with pale skin, long dark blue hair, green eyes, and massive D cup breasts. The tremors get closer and closer every second. You knew that you had to get out of here, so you began to run for your life as Yumi, the titanic blue haired girl, was destroying and killing everything and everyone in sight. Unfortunately for you, Yumi spots you as you are running, and she grabs you before you ever had a chance to escape. She then brought you up to her face and let out an intimidating roar that terrified you to your core.

Yumi's imitation of a monster roar was so loud, in fact, that it unleashed a shock wave that rattled the entire M district. Buildings shook on their foundations, and everyone in the city was trembling in fear. They all began to run for their lives, but Luna and Soya easily noticed the frenzied mob of miniature men. The two girls lifted their feet up and slammed down on the spots that had the most people in them.The two giantesses killed everyone in sight, and Yumi began to walk back into the city to meet up with her friends. After the three reunited with each other, they immediately returned to Yumi's home, where Yumi had a surprise waiting for the all of the little men that she and her friends had captured. Inside her home, Yumi had set up an arena were she would pit the tiny men against each other for her own entertainment.

Since she lives by herself, Yumi's main excitement came from her arena battles. However, she is often visited by the other preteen and teen girls who lived nearby. Her friends often brought their own captured men over to Yumi's house, and in cases like this, the arena became a bloodbath. While Yumi herself liked to keep most of her captives as slaves and only use a few of them in the arena, the other girls would pit almost all the men they had collected over time against themselves in the arena. The outcome was always obvious, as not even 500 of the little men could hope to bring down a single one of the giantesses, and the fights only really came down to 2 things: How the girls decided to kill their captives, and how long the men could prolong their inevitable demise... And now you had been brought into this house of torture...

She then slammed her fist down on the table right next to you. Her hand crashed mere inches away from where you were standing, and the impact shook you off your feet. Seeing how close her massive fist was to crushing your fragile form, your fear immediately over took you. You knew that you had no other option than to give in to her demands.

"O-okay....." You say nervously, still trembling from the frightening experience. You couldn't stop your body from shaking in fear no matter how hard you tried.

"So, what do you want me to do for you, my goddess." you asked.

1533211221.content:
"No way! We need every edge we can get in this battle! You can't just take away the only chance we have of surviving this thing! Come on, there has to be a rule against doing something like this!" you yelled at her in a fit of anger.

Yumi, who was fairly shocked that you had the nerve to stand up to her orders, decided to humor you. You saw her get out a large book and flip through the pages. For a while, she had a smirk on her face that showed she hadn't seen anything that would support your argument. Just when you were giving up the hope that you would be able to use the one thing that could give you a shot at survival, you saw Yumi's smirk fade away.

"Crap, he's right! Rule 135, paragraph 2; once the weapons for the battle have been selected, they can't be changed under any circumstances..." Yumi announced in frustration.

While she herself had made the rules, she never expected for any of them to work against her. That one was specifically made so that men wouldn't be allowed to change their minds about their equipment, but now it was keeping her from having her extra fun with this battle. Luna simply smiled at her friend.

"Don't worry about it, Yumi! These guys are as good as crushed anyway, so what harm could giving them their flashier toys do? In fact, I'm willing to bet that I can finish them all off in under 5 minutes!"

"Oh really? And what would you be willing to offer if any of these slaves actually manage to defeat you?" Yumi said with a laugh, already knowing that there was no way that Luna could lose.

"How about this: If by some off chance hell freezes over and one of these bugs actually manages to beat me, any of the ones who are still alive can take the role of our kings for the rest of their little lives! Are the rest of you girls okay with that?"

The crowd of giantesses all simply laughed an agreed. They all knew what the outcome of the battle would be anyway, so none of them considered it a risk to agree to this wager. Yumi simply smiled at the unanimous agreement, and you couldn't help but feel annoyed by how little these girls thought of you. While you knew as well as they did that there was no way you could defeat Luna if an entire trained army couldn't pull it off, the fact that they were all rubbing it in still hurt.

"Well, since everyone is in agreement about the terms of this battle... Let's get started!" Yumi yelled.

Luna immediately began stomping her way toward the men. They all scrambled to get their weapons ready and, taking aim at the approaching giantess, they let their rockets fly. There was a massive explosion as the rockets impacted with Luna's body, and the massive girl was stunned for a moment by the impact. Taking this opportunity, the men all threw every grenade they had in a desperate attempt to subdue the giantess. Unfortunately for them, her power was simply too great, and she wouldn't be taken down so easily. As the smoke from the explosions faded, Luna was still standing with only a few minor wounds on her body. The towering preteen simply laughed as she proceeded to crush every single man in her path. One by one they were killed off, smashed flatter than pancakes beneath Luna's cute yet deadly feet, until you were the only one left. Desperately, you scramble to get your weapon prepared to defend yourself as the feminine bringer of death approached you with an evil smirk on her face.

Yumi had a defeated expression on her face as she said these words, and soon stormed away in a huff. Meanwhile, as you were enjoying your feeling of victory, Yumi was incredibly irritated by this unexpected turn of events.

"I can't believe that he actually managed to survive! Now we've all gotta listen to that little twerp's orders from now on! Why did Luna have to go and make that stupid bet in the first place?!" she mumbled to herself in frustration.

153321122111.content:
Looking up at all the girls still in the arena, you noticed that many of them had somewhat worried expressions on their faces. You instantly were able to tell exactly what they were all thinking: They had all spent their entire lives abusing and enslaving males without the thought of consequence, and now one of the males that they had abused for so long had been put into a position of power by their own overconfidence. Now the shoe was on the other foot, and they all knew that you would surely use your power to make the rest of their lives miserable.

As you thought about this, you were struck by an idea. Women have always seen men as being inferior to them due to their smaller stature, but perhaps you could change that. Since women had always treated men like dirt, they've never even considered taking the time to get to know them. Perhaps if you could explain to them that men were just as sentient as women were, you would be able to establish peace between men and women. You knew that you had to do this for the future of male society. Speaking up, you begin to make your announcement to the hundreds of preteen girls who had gathered in the arena.

"Listen girls, I know that many of you are probably thinking that I will abuse this authority over you to get revenge for what you have done in the past. I'll admit that I would like very much to see how you would like being in our position for once, but at the end of the day, where would that leave us? Right back where we started, that's where! Men have always been abused by your kind, treated like dirt, and killed like vermin without a second thought. You've always tormented us for no reason other than the fact that you can. If I were to take this as an opportunity for revenge, then I would only be giving you a real reason to continue with that behavior!"

At this point, one of the girls in the crowd spoke up. She was a young girl with short black hair, & she appeared to have a fairly shy nature based on her facial expression and the way she wore her long bangs to partially cover her eyes. She was also one of the few girls in the crowd to be wearing something more modest than a bikini, as her outfit consisted of a short blue skirt and a purple tanktop.

"Wait a minute, you mean that you aren't going to torture us now that you're our king? Even after all that we've done to you and your kind?"

You simply shake your head.

"No, I'm not going to do that... Someone needs to end this cycle of hatred and suffering! Men have only ever wanted to live in peace, but I don't believe that you see us for what we really are! We are human beings, just like all of you, and just because we're smaller than you doesn't mean that we're any less human. I want all of you to understand that just because we're small doesn't mean you should be able to push us around. After all, how would you feel if you were the small ones instead of us? Would you want to have to live your life in fear, knowing that there are people out there who would take pleasure in ending your life at any given moment?"

The same girl from before, and several others along with her, shook their heads in response.

"Exactly! Think about this: What if you were born as one of us instead. What if you were one of the small, oppressed men who have to live their entire lives thinking that each moment could be their last. Imagine constantly having to worry about the fact that your life could be stolen from you in an instant by someone else, and for no other reason than that they're able to! Do you think that a life like that would be fair? Take those thoughts to heart, because that's how we feel now! I would like to try to change the way things are. I want to make life better for my kind by establishing peace with yours. We may not be as big as you are, but we're all the same on the inside."

As you finished speaking, you heard various comments from around the arena. Things like "I never even thought about things like that.", "Maybe I shouldn't have been so cruel to those guys before.", and "Why have we always hated men anyway? I don't think that they ever did anything to us before." were amongst the most common you heard. It seemed as if your speech might have gotten through to them. Feeling that you might be able to actually make this work, you decide to finish up your speech.

"Please girls, I don't need to be your king... All I ask is that you help me in righting the injustice of our society. Will you help me establish peace between men and women?"

"Sure little guy, we'd be glad to help make things right for all those little men out there!" one of the girls cheered.

"Yeah! I never thought about you guys having such difficult lives before! We'll do anything we can to help you out!" another very energetic sounding girl agreed.

"Now I feel really sorry for all those poor men I crushed on the way over here... I have to make things right no matter what it takes!" the original shy girl said, now with a purposeful determination in her voice.

You were amazed at how all of these girls seemed to agree with you after hearing your speech, and you began to cry with joy as you thought about the possibility of a long-awaited peace being just over the horizon.

"Thank you girls, thank you so much... You have no idea how much it means to me that you understand."

The girls all simply cheered for their new leader. Soon Yumi returned to the arena once again, and Luna had awakened from being unconscious. The two girls wondered what was going on, and why the worthless man they had just lost to now seemed to be loved by all the others. Koyuki, one of Luna and Yumi's closest friends, soon explained what had happened while they were out. It was amazing just how much had happened to you within such a short time. Within only 2 short days, you had been captured by a giantess, thrown into a deathmatch with another giantess, watched an entire army of men be flattened beneath the feet of said giantess, defeated her by sheer luck, and initiated as the king of the preteen girls!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
One month later...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

It had been a week since that fateful day when you became the king of the preteen girls, and so much had happened. That shy girl who was the first one to speak to you during your speech, who you later learned was named Mina, became your first female friend. Since your old home was destroyed along with the rest of the city during the original rampage, Mina had offered to allow you to live with her until a new home could be made for you. However, the most important thing was the fact that all the preteen girls (along with several teenage girls) had decided to make peace with males. Yumi, Luna, and Koyuki had become ambassadors of sorts, now spending much of their time trying to aid the growth of peaceful relations between men and women. Things had become much better in such a short time, and it was almost hard to believe that these girls who you were now spending most of your time with had been out to kill you and your kind only four short weeks ago.

Still, things were far from ideal for men around the world. While the word had spread and preteen girls worldwide had all shed their hatred of men, the adult women and most teenage girls still hated them as much as always. Will the preteen girls be able to convince their parents and older siblings to accept peace with men as well, or will the older women remain merciless toward them?

Yet another month had come and gone since the preteens set out to spread the word of peace between the sexes. At first you were worried that they would be the only ones to listen to you, since the older women had been alive much longer, and probably wouldn't be as willing to change their ways at the young girls you had already made peace with. Much to your relief, many of them soon came to you telling how they had convinced their parents and older siblings to accept a new way of life.

Soon, many adult women and teens had heard the story, and it even made it onto the news. Your words had spread like wildfire as they opened up new a new path for society. It had become evident to males and females alike that peace could be made, and that both races are equal even though girls were much taller than men. Within only two months' time, the entire world had begun to change as both the sexes coordinated the development of a new peaceful society. Everyone was given an opportunity to live an equal life. Up until now women had simply captured men to use as sex slaves in order to reproduce, and they would simply dispose of them (and any male children that were conceived) once they were finished with them. This tradition was soon eradicated, as marriages led to much happier families, and population growth was now equal for both men and women. You were amazed that just that one speech on that fateful day was enough to change the entire world.

Up until now most people had lived all alone, but for the first time in history, people had begun living together in families. Over the years, you had become a famous icon as the man who brought about this peace.

You had just finished writing a novel with your lifetime experience of surviving one of the darkest periods in history, the age when females had ruled with an iron fist. Your novel has now gotten worldwide success, and many found it the most powerful book besides the bible.

You decided to head into the movie theater to see the new movie that stars your 16 year old friend Koyuki. At that point, you would be forced to endure a life of endless suffering without any hope for mercy.

The before you knew what even happened, one of the guards had used your mind control collar to render you unconscious. When you awakened again, you found yourself being released from your cell along with several prisoners, who had apparently all been captured during the time you were out. You were all chained up together like they were animals and forced to wear the mind control collars. These collars would be the bane of your existence, as they effectively shattered any hope you might have had to escape from the X Chamber. Any female in the entire facility could activate them to send painful electrical shocks into your brain, and your body would be forced to comply with their orders rather you wanted it to or not. Not only that, but these collars were specially designed models.

If by any chance you managed to get outside the walls of this prison, the collar on your neck would paralyze your body to halt any attempted escape. At that point, you would be flooded with painful electrical shocks and unable to move until one of the females in the facility deactivated it; having another prisoner pull you back in wouldn't work, as it required a female's voice authorization to stop the overwhelming flow of pain. Needless to say, they would probably rather watch you suffer in agony until you pass out from the pain than help you out by turning off the collar. Knowing that the remainder of your fate would be filled with nothing but misery, you reluctantly trudged on to the main hall.

It was there that you were greeted by a young girl, who you immediately recognized as your former owner's best friend Emily! Emily was a young 8 year old girl just like her friend, and she had long black hair that she often wore in a ponytail. Her childish body was as plain as any other girl her age, since she was too young to have had any development in her boobs or her butt yet. Still, she did have a very pretty face for her age, and the way she always wore pink nail polish was fairly cute as well. However, even though the two girls were the same age, their attitudes toward men were polar opposites. While your owner was playful and carefree, Emily was cruel and manipulative. You already knew that, despite her cute and childish appearance, Emily was even more coldhearted than any teen girl you had met to date. Cutting off your train of thought, Emily began to speak.

"Alright worms! You're all here because you're the lowest of the low; males who are too stupid to know their place, and foolishly tried to stand up to us girls! As I'm sure you're all painfully aware by now, we girls are the ones in charge of this world! You slugs only exist to serve us, and if you can't do that properly, then you're completely useless! Those of you who are too worthless to simply bow down to your superiors and follow orders don't even deserve to live! And that's where I, along with the other Punishment Enforcers of the X Chamber, come in; It's our job to make sure that the rest of your insignificant lives become a never-ending nightmare! Now, you will each be assigned to one of us for your first torture session starting today. Don't bother worrying about who gets you; your mind-control collars will make you walk right up to your new owners all on your own!"

And with that, Emily walked away. You were amazed to hear such cruel words coming from an 8 year old girl, but you had met Emily before, and you knew exactly what she was like. This was her true self. When she was around your previous owner, Emily would act nice and carefree just like her. The instant that the two of you were alone, however, that mask came off. Deep down, Emily was quite possibly the most evil little girl you had ever met in your life. You didn't have long to think about this, however, as you soon found your body walking against your will. You were headed toward your new owner, your inflicter of endless suffering, you were headed toward...
1533211221121111211212212112.title: Sentenced.

choices: "Spend the next hour worshipping my divine feet!"
"Giving me a back massage!"
15332112211211112112122121121.content:
With your body moving on its own, you looked forward nervously to see that you were headed toward an ominous looking metal door with a sign labeled "The Beast" hanging over it. You had heard of that title before. Supposedly the beast was the most terrifying girl in the entire X Chamber; a girl so powerful and cruel that she even drove terror into the Punishment Enforcers themselves! Knowing where you were headed, you began to try and struggle against the collar's command. However, a swift and painful electrical shock to your brain immediately froze your efforts cold. You continued walking forward without even trying to.

As you entered the massive doors against your will, you walked into a massive empty room. Empty except for one key thing: laying down in the center of the area is a 500ft tall Amy! Instead of her usual attire, however, Amy was currently wearing a red version of the Punishment Enforcers' usual dominatrix outfit. Unlike the others, however, Amy's uniform also had a pair of red demon wings on the back of it. Despite her change of clothes, you instantly were able to recognize her as the most destructive and merciless member of the master's elite guard, and you felt all the color fade from your face as you were flooded with terror. If she was going to be your new owner, you knew you would rather have had Maria crush you under her foot than bring you here. As Amy sees you and several other prisoners entering her chamber, she sits up and playfully introduces herself to all of you.

"Welcome to the X Chamber, slaves. This is going to be your new home from now on. Here, you will experience torture, suffering, agony, and just pain in general. Anything that you've been through up until now? Forget about it! What you'll be going through here will make your miserable lives up until now seem like heaven in comparison! As you all know, you were imprisoned here for being too stupid to follow orders from your female owners. This is a terrible crime for creatures as lowly as you to commit, and now you will have to serve me and the other Punishment Enforcers while enduring the worst torture imaginable! Some may be for 5 years, some ten, others for life. We won't be giving you anything but the bare essentials for survival, and you won't even get that much if you fail to comply with our orders perfectly. Now, some of you might be able to get let out early so you can return to serving your former owners once again. But that all depends on if you can even live long enough." Amy explained. "So, are there any questions?"

"Yes." you asked. "Why did they call you the beast?"

Amy's playful smile shifted to an ominous smirk as she lowered her head right in front of you. You could feel the enormous girl's breath washing over you as she prepared to speak.

"Do you really want to find out the answer to that, worm?" she asked in a taunting voice.

You immediately backed up in fear as you shook your head.

"N-no Goddess, I'm sorry I asked..."

Amy simply laughed as she heard this.

"Oh, goddess? Well, well! It looks like you are learning your proper place already! So, how about you get started on your first task then. You slaves are going to..."
15332112211211112112122121121.title: Amy, The Beast

choices: To the door on the right: The kitchen
To the door on the left: The bathroom
153321122112111121121221211211.content:
"You shall all worship my divine feet! I am your goddess from this day forward, and I expect you all to treat me as such!" Amy demanded.

The collars start beeping red, and your body begins bowing down at the feet of The Beast. Everyone else did the same, but Amy didn't seem satisfied by simple bowing down.

"Listen up slaves, I said worship my feet! That means I want you to pamper them as if they themselves were godesses! You all know what I mean, so stop slacking off!"

Hearing this, everyone walked up to her feet and began rubbing them with all their might. However, despite trying your hardest to satisfy her, the stench of Amy's feet was draining you and the other men of the energy you needed to do this job. You all rubbed her massive feet as hard as you possibly could, but Amy was still far from impressed.

"Not good enough! *sigh* Looks like you are going to find out why I'm called the beast." Amy said.

She then picks up one of the slaves and she did something that would result in a slow and painful death. She tossed his minuscule form into her mouth and swallowed him whole. You watched in horror as Amy traced the man's path down her throat with her index finger, before finally lifting it up and letting out a satisfied belch. She then glared down at the remaining slaves, who were almost paralyzed with fear. Seeing the fate that awaited them if they couldn't satisfy Amy, however, was enough to drive them to complete their task successfully. After an hour of intense foot labor, Amy smirked down at her collection of slaves again.

"Well done, worms. It looks like the rest of you will be able to survive today's session. Now, I want all of you to get as much rest as possible. Tomorrows task is going to be your first real assignment here, and I highly doubt that all of you will make it through alive. See you later, slaves!"

With that, Amy snapped her fingers to trigger the collars again. Once again, you found yourself being forced into unconsciousness by the collar's shock. You woke up the next morning in excruciating pain from having slept on the hard stone flooring all night. Before you could do anything else, your body began walking toward another room. Noticing that there were two doors, you realized you would have to do one of the two tasks.

On the right was the door to the kitchen. If you ended up in there, your task would be to prepare an amazing lunch for Amy and the Punishment Enforcers. If they weren't satisfied with the food you made them, then they would decide to eat YOU for lunch instead!

On the left was the door to the bathroom. If you ended up in there, your task would be to give the other four members of the Elite Guard a nice relaxing bath. You would have to scrub each of them thoroughly and by hand, and if you weren't able to complete the task successfully, then the girls would end up cleaning your clock!


As you get closer to the doors, you realize that you are heading...
153321122112111121121221211211.title: Worshipping the feet of the beast

choices: The door on the right: The miniature arena
The door on the left: The virtual fear chamber
1533211221121111211212212112112.content:
Your body started to turn left along with a bunch of other slaves to the bathroom, which from the looks of things look outstanding. but that was just the beginning, because you have your next task, and it's soon explained to you by Amy.

"Okay, it's seems like you got enough rest because today's task is going to be a good one, because of the fact that you will be cleaning the Elite Guard, and if you fail to complete it in good quality, or if you refuse to do your task, this might as well be your last day alive."

Amy then left the room to supervise the other tasks.

Than you got your supplies and you went to Koyuki, the girl you were assigned to clean. She is wearing a blue bikini suit and from the looks of things, she is smoking hot for a 15 year old. Than you immediately begun your orders in the huge bathtub and began washing with other slaves her main body parts. And during the whole thing, she was impressed that you made sure every spot is cleaned to perfection. There was some slaves that failed to meet her requirements, and they were eaten by Koyuki much to the horrors of everyone. However, it seemed that the girls were mostly happy with the males performance.

"Its seems like this task was a no brainer, that is good for you. But let me tell you your next task, it will be unlike anything you ever witness, and it involves your fears." Amy said upon reentering the room.

While it seems like you be living another day, you were worried about what Amy just said. Still, you didn't have time to think. Soon your body was moving on its own again, and you were headed toward another pair of doors.

On the right was a replica of the arena. While it was big enough to allow a single girl inside, it was only intended to be used for male on male fights. If you ended up in there, you and the other males will be put into combat with each other for the entertainment of Maria. You have two ways to win, survive long enough for her to declare that she's satisfied, or kill all the males and be the last one standing. Fail to comply, and she is more than inclined to end your lives.

On the left was a virtual reality chamber, where Emily was in charge. If you ended up there, you would have to endure your worst fears being brought to life. If you aren't able to face them head on and win, then the evil young girl will be giving you something that's really worth being afraid of!

Which one are you heading to this time?
1533211221121111211212212112112.title: Washing  titanesses, that's intense.

choices: Sayaka's Puppet Game
Sarah and Melissa's deadly hide and seek game.
15332112211211112112122121121121.content:
As you turn right and entered the arena, you see Maria standing about the arena, and begins to explain the combat rules.

"Okay slaves. It seems the last task was easy, but today it's a practice round. You can select any weapon of your choosing, and you will battle it out on the arena in a gladiator like match. There is two ways to win. Either survive all 5 minutes of the round, or be the last person standing with allthe other males fighting killed. To win my respect, I go for the kill."

The slaves choose their weapons which consists of swords, bows, hammers, and axes, and they are shields as well. The slaves practice hitting targets with their weapons, Maria was quite impressed, even though they are slaves that take the more less violent route, but those collar shocks got them back on track. Than after an hour, Maria halts the action and explains more.

"Now you might know we don't support guns of any type since it make the arena to easy to win, and get around, plus during specific fights, you will experience matches like capture the flag, team deathmatch, etc, and some matches might either involve a punishment enforcer, or an elite guard. That is all you need to know today, now get out of my sights, worms."

Than you got through another task which proved to be hard, but thrilling, but where you are going next is something unlike any other.

Puppet Game: Sayaka has several selected prisoners to battle it out in a movie theater, which is something out of a horror film. And what's worse is that your body is control by not only by the collar, but by a set of strings that she ties to your limbs as well. If you aren't able to successfully kill your opponent in the time limit, or if you can't manage to move your body in sync with Sayaka's puppet strings, you'll be punished by having your limbs torn off one by one!

Virtual City Chamber: Sarah and Melissa, a pair of 11 year old twins, have you to play hide and seek with them in a VCchamber, and if you are caught, you are dead. If you stay hidden long enough to survive her rampage, than you live. Double the giantesses means double the threat.
15332112211211112112122121121121.title: First day war.

choices: Medical Center: Roxanne's deadly experiments
Meeting Room: The Master's offers and chances for better life.
153321122112111121121221211211211.content:
You moved to the next stage only to see there is no light in the room at all. Before you knew what was happening, the collars started flashing again, and you and the othes instantly fell unconscious again. It was here that the Enforcer of this room appeared before their sleeping forms.

Sayaka was a 12 year old girl with short red hair, which she often wore in pigtails, and she had fairly tanned skin. She was one of the most well known girls in the city, mainly due to her popular 'human puppet shows', which involved her using males as puppets and pitting them against eachother in a battle to the death.

Looming over the unconscious forms of the prisoners with a playful smirk on her face, she picks up all the males and ties them into a row of seats and turns on the lights. Everyone soon wakes up from their unwilling sleep, only to realize that they were all bound to audience chairs that were facing a large puppet stage. They then saw Sayaka appear from behind the stage, and she began to explain.

"Sorry I had to knock you out like that, but I needed a bit of time to get you all prepared for my show. Allow me to explain what will happen in my facility here. You see, it's pretty similar to the mini-arena, but instead of a free-for-all battle between all of you slaves, you will only be fighting 1-on-1. However, there are a fair few rules to make things more... Entertaining for me."

With that, Sayaka whipped her hand out and scooped up a man from her captive audience before anyone could even blink an eye. She then skillfully untied the strings she had cocooned his body with, only to rearrange them in a way that made him look like he really was a puppet. He had one string tied to each wrist and each ankle, and a fifth string was wrapped around his waist. Each of them were attached to one of the golden rings that Sayaka wore on each finger, and the massive girl giggled with glee as she took a moment to manipulate her living puppet in various ways before resuming her explanation.

"You see, I am the greatest puppet master in the entire city. As such, I take great pride in my ability to skillfully manipulate my puppets in any way I want. For this facility, you have to deal with several impediments while you attempt to kill your opponent. First of all, you must defeat him and take his life within a time limit of 3 minutes. Also, if any of your movements fail to comply with the motions of my strings, I can easily rip your limbs off one by one with a simple jerk of my finger. I'm a master of making pinpoint movements, so don't underestimate my skills. You must be sure that you move your body in sync with my gestures if you want to escape in one piece!"

At that, Sayaka proceeded to untie all of the men and send them on their way. You have a few more Punishment Enforcers to meet in the next few days, but this next one will be the last one for today.

The Medical Center: A mad scientist named Roxanne serves as the X Chamber's nurse. She is 21 years old and has a figure similar to Maria's, albeit less impressive in the chest area, having only B-cup breasts. She has long pink hair, which she usually wears in one long braid. She wears a pair of attractive thin-rimmed glasses, and usually wears a doctor's uniform over her Punishment Enforcer dominatrix outfit. While her job description says that she is here to help the injured prisoners recover so that they can return to their duties again, She greatly prefers to use males as test subjects for many of her deadly experiments. Rumors have been told of how men that end up in her care often return with drastic alterations to their body, and that's if they manage to return at all. Needless to say, she earned her position among the Punishment Enforcers for being one nasty nurse.

The Meeting Room: While this room is usually off limits to the prisoners, due to the fact that it doubles as the Punishment Enforcers' lounge room while they're off duty, today is an exception. The Master himself, along with his Elite Guard (minus Amy, who is still on duty in a different room of the X Chamber), will be giving you and the other slaves a speech on how you may be able to improve your lives after being let out of the X Chamber. They will be explaining how you will be allowed to get out, as well as what will happen to you afterward.

Which of these two rooms are you heading to?

1533211221121111211212212112112112.content:
As you head to the final door today, you are surprised to see it like an huge theater room, you decided to sit down with the other slaves for this important meeting. All of the Punishment Enforcers are present around the slaves and sat down in their chairs, and even the Elite Guard, now fully upgraded with the formulas and bracelets, were near the master who proceeds to explain the offer.

"Alright. Listen you slaves, I know what we have been putting you through is by far bad enough, but that is just the beginning. Tomorrow, hell will break loose inside the X Chamber. Your worst fears come to live here, and the only way to conquer it is to face it head on. I helped the females by backstabbing your race as a whole. But we aren't completely heartless, this is a chance for redemption. If you manage to do that, you will return back to your owners to be their slaves again. You will know your place in this world, as a slave, a worm, a lowly insect destined to be crushed beneath the feet of your female superiors. However, if you exceed our expectations and show that you have a great lust for power, than I will take you with me to live a great life in paradise. You will be allowed to rule alongside me and live in the same luxurious lifestyle that the females themselves do. Either way, you have to survive through your time here before any of that can happen. You will complete tasks that can involve the Punishment Enforcers, my Elite Guard, and The Beast! Succeed, you live, fail, you die. It's that simple."

Many of the slaves booed the Master in anger, and many of them started complaining. Koyuki soon spoke up.

"That is enough trash talk! Anyone that tries resisting any of us can have their sentenced made much worse!"

Than Maria added on.

"Okay worms, that is it for the day, it is time to head to your cells. And to be nice, you will have a roommate, and the cells is like the ones in prison, tomorrow is a big day, some people will endure torture, others will fight in the arena, and some will be spared. Now fuck off out of here and to your cells."

Than your body begins to live to your prison cell, and it looks like any other prison cell. Bed, toilet, TV, Radio, etc. And actually your homeroom giantess is a 12 year old Punishment enforcer you meet earlier, Sayaka. So at least you are lucky it's not Amy, The Beast herself.

Who is your roommate?

15332112211211112112122121121121121.content:
Your room will be shared with Mike, a 23 year old techno genius that has brown hair, light skin, and is wearing a black shirt and blue jeans. He appeared to be a bit on the cocky side, so you decided to ask him why he was here. Of course, you wanted to greet him properly before you asked him at anything like that.

"Yo!" you greeted.

"What's up dude, my name is Mike, and you are?" he asked.

"My name is Jack. Its nice to meet you. Say, what exactly got you locked up here?" you asked him nicely.

"Well, that would be my 13 year old owner Mary. She was so destructive and devilish, and she always messed my day up big time, making me color her toenails and that shit. I was so fed up with her that I said 'Alright you filthy whore, I have had it with your constant torturing.' And of course she was furious... And wouldn't it be my luck that her mother was right there when it happened?! So now I will be serving 2 to 5 years here at the X Chamber, and of course my homeroom giantess is Sayaka." he explained.

"I experienced something similar to that, and like you, I will be here 2 to 5 years too." you responded.

"But the master had a good reason, and heck I want to live a great life. I want to work together with him to show those inferiors that we can be just as strong and ruthless as any girls can!" he said.

You had mixed thoughts about the master, as he did of course lock you up for such a minor crime. You never even hit that girl once, and even if you had, it's not like it would have hurt her at all! You decide to ask why Mike felt this way.

"And why would I want to do that?" you asked.

"So we can get out of this nightmare and get the same quality of life that the girls get. Better the other guys suffer in here than me." he said.

"Suit yourself." you responded with a smirk.

Any removal attempts will automatically trigger the alarm, attracting the nearby Punishment Enforcer, and depending if you are resisting at the person that is trying to remove your collar, anyone can be punished for trying to remove it, but both will be punished if both tries to escape. And lastly, anyone that is caught outside of the prison walls, or even out of their cells from 11 PM to 6 AM, will be sentenced to death by The Beast! Is that clear?!" she explained.

And then, the whole crowd of males responded all together as they had no other options.

"Yes Goddess Sayaka!"

Sayaka just giggled and blushed because of the males loyalty to her.

"Thanks. Now, I'll go get those new uniforms for you. I want all of you to get changed quickly and begin heading to the first task of the day!"

Then your body, thanks to the collar, headed back to the cell on its own. You got out of your normal jeans and black shirt, and put on those new uniforms that the X Chamber is now requiring for slaves. You and Mike say that these uniforms will make them the same, but at least they are comfortable and easy to move around in. But the strange thing is the numbers that are on them now. Your number is 28, and Mike's is 29. The Punishment Enforcers started the policy that no males should have a name again, and that they are all number coded for their new names now.

After switching into your new uniform, you and Mike begins heading to the two doors that each had a different task. But you and Mike will have the same task no matter what.

The Beast's Torture Chamber: The Beast has decided to host to the slaves the death sentences to the slaves that tried to escape the place yesterday, plus for some other serious crimes. And everyone is there, Elite Guard, Punishment Enforcers, and even the Master himself. Since you and Mike are lucky to be alive and watching, doesn't mean you will be scared.

choices: The Void: One screw up serving and everyone dies.

1533211221121111211212212112112112121.content:
As you and Mike entered the door with the other males, you are surprised to see that it is the arena that was normally used for battles, but for this task, you will be watching other inmates lives come to a bitter and painful end. You got to your seat with Mike to watch the death sentences carry out by The Beast, who now comes out of the huge metal door, unleashing a growling roar at the slaves that will be killed below. Since yesterday, they have been only ten people that tried to escape Chamber X, and all ten were captured. And now, their lives are coming to an end today. She then begins to speak to the slaves that will die today.

"Okay you worms! You have been brought here to watch these pitiful slaves, who were foolish enough to try and escape from the X Chamber, have their lives crushed under my massive feet! Okay 5, 27, 39, 45, 53-54, 57-59, it's time for you to die!"

She then raised her massive foot into the air, getting ready to crush the fools that tried to escape last night. The males that were about to die gave up all hope, and just stood there without any emotion as the foot of The Beast descended to crush them all. Amy then twisted her foot back and forth, grinding the crushed slaves into the hard stone floor to ensure that they were truly dead. The crowd around the arena watched in excitement as those lives came to a bitter end by the powerful feet of Amy. The males like you watched in horror as those innocent lives were taken away by a simple and effortless stomp from Amy, but Mike was simply watching the execution with a satisfied grin on his face. At this point, Amy looks at you and the others as her temper boiled over to it's highest.

"That is what will happen to any of you insects if you ever try to escape from the X Chamber! If any of you are stupid enough to try resisting against your female rulers, you WILL die! Also, the master has recently declared a new law that will make things much more active around here. It is called 'The X Chamber Isolation Act'. From now on, all males from around the world will be collected and brought here to live in confinement. Malekind will now live exclusively within the walls of the X Chamber for their entire lives. Your puny race must follow our every command to the letter, or you can just enjoy being crushed into paste like these idiots were! You're all going to learn that you belong to us now, and anyone who thinks that males are capable of anything more than serving at the feet of their female rulers can just forget about that! Your kind has been destined to be ruled by women from the day that humanity was created, and now it's time that destiny puts you all in your rightful place!" Amy announced with a cruelly sadistic grin on her face.

You, Mike, and all of the other slaves then begin to head out to your next task. Serving the female rule would be your permanent life from now on, and that life would be filled with nothing but the torment of slavery. But where were you going now?


The Void: The worst of all the task you have to ever do. You have to serve Amy and her all-powerful friends (both the Elite Guard and the Punishment Enforcers), making sure to satisfy all of their needs without question. But here is the catch, if one person screws up, everyone will be given their death sentences and will die in the arena. Just hope that you (and everyone else here) are up for the task.

The parade: The only time you will be ever out of the X Chamber, you must serve all the females during a parade in the city to celebrate their unquestionable superiority over males. This will be a once-per-year deal, and females from around the globe will gather for the opportunity to dominate the inferior males. Women are the ones ruling the world now, and everyone will be watching to make sure that the slaves do a good job, so if you make one mistake at this point... Game over...
1533211221121111211212212112112112121.title: Death row inmates' humiliating de-feet.

Question hearings for anyone that might be unsure of anything
15332112211211112112122121121121121211.content:
You and the other slaves enters the massive Void room, which is an endless cavern filled with no hope of escape. But several hundred feet high, you see all of the Punishment Enforcers and Elite Guards sitting at their thrones like they were rulers of the world. They all glare at the slaves with pure hatred in their eyes. Then Koyuki begins to speak.

"Welcome to the Void, the worst of all places in the X Chamber. Your lives can all be taken by the mistake of one person, so you must get it right on your first try, otherwise everyone in this entire room will be sentenced to death in an instant. And since a quick death would be far too merciful for you worthless slaves, we will each take our time torturing you in the worst ways imaginable before we finish you off! No male will ever be getting fresh air again, no one will see the outside world again, no one will have the chance to redeem themselves to do anything other than being the slaves of your goddesses for life. So I hope you are up for the task today, because you will be worshiping us all without question! And for your first task, I demand you all to bow down and worship us goddesses for a full hour."

The mind control collars didn't activate this time. The girls wanted to see you worshiping them of your own free will, and you knew that you had no choice but to submit to their desires. You and the other powerless males knew that your lives were at their mercy, so you all began to kneel down and chant your worship to the all-powerful goddesses before you. The girls were all simply laughing together about how easy it had been for them to bring the entire planet to its knees.

"This is so much fun! I just love how pathetic males are! They really do make the perfect slaves!" Emily said with a devilish smile.

"You are so right, kid! And now that every male is being forced to live in here with us, we can spend all the time we want making the lives of their entire race into living hell." Maria responded to her daughter's best friend.

The girls spent the next hour simply laying back and basking in the universal respect they were receiving from their slaves. At the end of the hour the slaves ceased their worship, and every one of the females were amused by the amount of authority they had over the male race. Men worldwide would soon have no choice but to submit their loyalty to them. Giggling deviously at the thought of hundreds of males flocking to her from around the world, throwing themselves submissively before her mighty feet due the simple knowledge of how easily they could flatten their lives beneath them, Amy began to speak.

"Nice work, worms. It looks like you'll be allowed to keep your miserable lives for today. Now, get to your homeroom giantess's lair! There is something important that they will be explaining to all of you soon."

Amy then snapped her fingers, signalling for you and the slaves to remove yourselves from her presence. You quickly head back to the Puppet Room to hear the information that Sayaka would be sharing with you.

153321122112111121121221211211211212112.content:
You got to your seat as Sayaka appear, willing to take any questions regarding what the Master has recently done to all the males in the world. Than she began to speak.

"Okay, okay, I know many of you are extremely mad that you will all be staying here for the rest of your worthless lives. So for those of you who were wondering why, it's because the Master and the female rulers felt that it would be easier to keep your puny race under our thumb if we had you all in one enclosed location. Having every male live here in a place where they know that they can never escape from will just make you that much easier to control. But as much fun as it would be to have more slaves to torture, we've been given orders to only harm the males that were put in here for a reason. Everyone else will be allowed to just live here and go about their daily lives as usual. Provided they remain loyal to their masters, they will be allowed to wear a special uniform which identifies them as those who were smart enough not to rebel against their superiors."

Then you asked her a question regarding the info she gave.

"Okay, I get that the men who will be coming here who remained loyal to their masters won't be getting punished like the rest of us... But won't those women want to keep their men? What if a woman doesn't want to give up their slave?"

Sayaka responds with a grin and smile on her face.

"Well, that's a good question little guy. And it's nice to see that there's actually someone in here who has the common sense to place his goddess's happiness before his own! Anyway, if a woman desires to keep their slaves, then they can just come here and sign a few documents to transfer ownership of one of our slaves back to them. Men wearing the standard white uniform are here to be punished and reeducated on their role in life, so they won't be put up for 'adoption.' However, the newcomers who haven't committed any crimes, as well as any men who are able to prove to us that they've thrown away their pointless pride and embraced their true role in life, will be allowed to wear a special red uniform that identifies them as properly trained slaves. They will be excused from the torturous activities of the other prisoners, and will be available for adoption should any woman desire to have their own personal slave again." she explained.

After Sayaka gave her explanation, all of the men were allowed to return to their cells and rest up for the next day. Well, all except for you and Mike anyway. Sayaka had called you two into her personal bedroom for something. When you and Mike entered the room, she patted you both on the head with her index finger and handed you each one of the red uniforms she mentioned earlier.

"Congratulations little guys. I didn't want to say it in front of all the other slaves, but you've been able to impress us with your loyalty. You never once tried to oppose our orders, or even complain about them. You two just submitted to us right from the start, and I was quite surprised to here a question like the one you asked earlier. You really do know your place in this world, serving unquestioningly at the feet of your goddesses! You're prime examples of what all males should be like, so you will be allowed to graduate from the X Chamber's torture. However, keep in mind that these red uniforms are a symbol of your loyalty. If you ever do anything foolish to try and oppose us, you will be thrown into an even worse position than before! I didn't tell any of the others this, but we do have a blue uniform that indicates males who have betrayed our trust. If you end up in one of those... Well, let's just say that you'd be better off dead!"

And with that, you and Mike accepted the red uniforms before returning to your cells.

"You guys sure are lucky, you know that! We've already got someone who wants to adopt a couple of slaves, and since you're the only ones in red at the moment, it looks like you'll be going with her!" she says as she carries you to the exit.

"That one's rich! Inferior scumbags... I've really gotta use that some time..." Sayaka giggled. "By the way, about those Blue uniforms. There is one place that no one wants to ever end up. The Void."

"Hey, I heard what happen to you. You really snapped at your owner, and you got two to five here for that crime. That master really gives me a headache." Ross responded.

"He's just mad with power. Forget about him. By the way, what did you do to get here?"

"Well, its a very long story, but I will cut it straight to the point. I was the 'slave' of a 13 year old girl named Sherry. She lives by herself and thinks that males are equal like them. She's the only female I've ever met to realize that just because we're smaller than them doesn't mean that we aren't people like them. When I was sentenced to life in the X Chamber for my crimes, she swore that she would set things right and end the Master's rule. She lives far away from the F-District in a ninja village, and my life was great when I was with her. She also swore that she would get me out. But I want to get you out as well, because I heard you never lost your pride to the females, and now I want to help you."

"Okay, so what is the plan?"

I plan on getting out of tonight, and you will come if it works. We'll have to navigate the airvents, get to one of the emergency exits, and escape out of the building. Sherry's gonna make sure that the security system is disabled, and I am going to call several of my friends to come picks us up."
