Your yelp had given away your position, and your helpless body was soon wrapped in the massive fingers of the young giantess. Your body was lifted into the air with incredible speed, and you quickly found yourself staring face to face with one of the preteen goddesses. She had shoulder length green hair, and her eyes matched that color. As you nervously looked at her surprisingly cute face, the giant girl gave you a stern look.

"So, I bet you think that you are pretty smart, huh? You thought that you could hide from me? Well it looks like you weren't smart enough, because now I've got you!" She taunted.

You began to tremble with fear as she dangled you very close to her face. You were so close to her mouth that you could feel her warm breath bathing over your body as she spoke. As you continued to look at her, you recognized this giantess from several stories you had heard. You remembered that her name was Luna, and she was a girl who lived to rampage in the male cities. In fact, she enjoyed it so much that she would often go out of her way to walk through the male communities, carelessly crushing everything she could under her massive feet.

You had even heard rumors that she would often catch some of her victims and make them serve as her foot slaves. You were told that none of them survived, because they all either disobeyed her orders or failed to satisfy her expectations. The most terrifying rumor you had heard about her, however, was that Luna liked to eat helpless men just for the fun of it. She supposedly tossed them into her mouth, spent a while playing with their struggling bodies with her tongue, and then swallowed her captives alive. Even her friends found that a bit disgusting, but Luna herself didn't care.

You were utterly terrified by the fact that your life was now completely dependent upon what this cruel preteen goddess wanted to do with you...


What will happen now?
15333.title: Meeting Luna.

choices: She gets bored with you, and she decides to eat you anyway.
She takes you home and decides to keep you as a pet.
153331.content:
You stare at Luna in fear as she holds you in front of her face. You didn't know what she was planning, but you knew it wouldn't be good for you. Your fears are answered as Luna speaks up.

"Alright little guy, I'm getting pretty hungry. I'm sure you can guess what I'm going to do with you now..." she say tauntingly.

Your eyes widen in horror as you see her lips part to reveal a cave of flesh. Strips of saliva are dripping from the roof of her mouth, and her moist breath washes your face. Luna's massive tongue extends to you like a red carpet, glistening with a layer of saliva. You soon feel yourself descending as Luna lowers you down to her waiting mouth. You squirm against her powerful grip in a desperate attempt to escape, but you soon find your efforts to be useless. Just as you are about to surrender to your seemingly inevitable fate, your brain as struck with an idea: If you can manage to get this giantess to like you, she may decide not to eat you. It was an unlikely plan, but you were desperate enough to try anything at this point.

"Wow, you have some really nice teeth!" you said, trying to flatter her.

To your surprise, Luna stops lowering you toward her mouth and looks at you curiously.

"What did you say to me, you little bug?" She asked to you, a little confused as to why you would say something like that.

"I said that you have a nice teeth!" you respond with a smile. "You really must take good care of them! They're so bright and shiny, and your breath is really refreshing too!"

Luna begins to blush from your compliments.

"So, do you really like my breath little guy?" she asked.

"Of course! Your breath smells as sweet as a field of flowers!" you reply, trying to maintain your smile.

Giggling, Luna proceeds to give you a wave of breath. You can feel your skin becoming a little moist as she exhales over your body. While her breath really wasn't as fresh as you had claimed, it still wasn't that bad. You were trying to escape with your life, so you were willing to fudge the truth a bit.

"Did you like that, little guy?" She asked with a playful smile.

"Certainly! I've never smelled anything sweeter in my life!" you said, desperate to appeal to your giantess captor.

Luna giggled and give you a different smile. Unlike the ones you had seen before, it wasn't evil or mischievous. Instead, her smile this time actually seemed to be angelic.

"You know what? I think that you're a pretty cute little guy. I suppose that I won't be eating you after all." Luna said. "Well, you'll be coming with me. I think that I'll be keeping you for a while."

Before you can even say anything, Luna lowers you down to her chest and drops you into her cleavage! It was a tight squeeze between her boobs, as even though they weren't that big by female standards, they were still colossal compared to a male like you. Feeling you squirming to get into a more comfortable position between her young boobs, Luna simply giggles.

"Okay little guy, I hope you enjoy yourself in there. I'm just going to finish up my fun before I head home."

She then stomps off to resume her destruction of your city. While you felt sorry for all the other men that you knew would be killed by her, you were glad that you had managed to convince Luna to spare your life.


What will happen next?
153331.title: Who said that flattery gets you nowhere?!

choices: She has you massage and clean some part of her body.
She plays a game with you.
She introduces you to her friends.
1533312.content:
After a few hours, you hear her start leaving the city. Pretty soon she is in the world of the giants. You’re a little scared – very few humans have returned – but you are at least alive.

Her fingers take you out and drop you onto her palm as she lifts you to her face.

“Well hello again,” she says. “I hope you had a great trip.”

“Yes Beautiful, I certainly did,” you flirt, maintaining the tone.

“Ooh,” she winks, planting you a kiss. “I could get used to that.”

What does she do with you first?
1533312.title: Home

choices: Get to Licking
Refuse and Await Death
153332.content:
Luna's cruel eyes stared at you for what felt like the longest time. Observing, measuring, judging you. The look they had wasn't one someone had when they looked at another person, it wasn't even a look a person would give a bug. It was just... indifferent. Everything here was as natural as the sun setting. Males existed to satisfy the whims of women, be it by being crushed or enslaved. It was the natural order of the world. Even if Luna herself derived pleasure from tormenting people, there was nothing special about this. Give it a week and she probably wouldn't even remember anything about it, including you. That's how insignificant you were here. In the reflection of Luna's irises you could see a dead man. The odds of you dying were almost a guarantee, and any life you could hope to get right now wouldn't be one worth living. And it all hinged on the whims of this kid. It was so unfair. Someone years younger than you, born into an existence that makes them better than you in every way.

"You're kind of cute for a bug." The giantess grinned, "I think I'll keep you as one of my pets. Maybe you'll last longer than my last one. He didn't even make it home. Too much crying and not enough working..." She trailed off into a bit of a rant.

Each word was spoken without room for input. It wasn't a request or an idea, it was a statement. As of right now you belonged to Luna, like it or not. There was no relief. You were just informed that you wouldn't be crushed but there was no pleasant feeling from that news. Because you knew, you knew you were going to get crushed by this girl at some point. It could be five minutes from now, it could be five years. At any given point if you annoyed her, crossed her, or simply if she was in a bad mood you were dead. Even if you lived your life completely dedicated to her whims, with no free will at all, she would eventually just crush you out of boredom. This wasn't a relief from execution, it was a delay.

"...But I can work out what to do with you later. I got to finish up your little buddies!" Luna's words drew your attention back.

"What? No, please do-"

"And you're going to watch!"

Luna's powerful fingers manhandled your tiny body, shoving your head between them and clamping around so you couldn't move. She flipped you over so your face was looking down at the ground below, in just the few seconds you spent with the girl there was already enough destruction to make you force your eyes shut. Though it seemed like your new owner foresaw this already, as her free hand brought a finger to your face and forcefully pulled your brow back.

"No..." The playful voice grew eerily cruel, "You're going to watch this."

She took a step forward, crushing a building with little effort. It was one belonging to an acquaintance, brought to an end by a single step from Luna. Her sandal rose from the rubble with dust and traces of blood and moved on to the next step. It seemed that with each step she took something was crushed, be it person or thing. You'd never seen first hand a person as they were crushed by a giantess, and now you wished that you didn't. They were people you knew, some you would go so far as to call friends, each meeting the same fate. They would be running when the ground darkened around them. They would turn their head and see the sole of Luna's unforgiving footwear overhead. This would make them go faster, usually stumbling in the process and getting crushed without mercy.

Beneath Luna's foot was a red liquid that spilled out into a pool and was soaked into the soles of her sandals. And when it came back up, the person was flat. Not any cartoony sort of thing, but seriously flat. Crushed into the ground and pulverized into an unrecognizable heap of blood and flesh. Just seeing it once was enough to justify vomiting, but to see it repeatedly? You wished you could vomit but fear of what Luna would do to you as punishment stopped it. You couldn't move your head, you couldn't look away. Below you were forced to see everything as it happened. All by Luna's actions. It was a shame because, in a different light, Luna was probably a different person. She looked like she and her friends were very nice with one another, different beings than the genocidal monsters ravaging the city. To her own kind Luna was probably a sweet, kind girl, and with her looks such attributes would've warranted your affection.

But she would only be like that to other women. Men like you were no different from the bugs littering the ground. She could be nice as imaginable, but that was only to people, and in the eyes of society you weren't a person. That was all you could think about, just how unfair everything was. These girls were all laughing and giggling like children at a playground, but what they were doing was nothing short of a massacre. Hundreds of people, hundreds of innocent lives who had never done anything wrong, were being snuffed out of existence by these three little girls. They had never done anything wrong, their only crime was simply existing. They were cursed by fate to be born as males, and so this was their destiny. Females were superior to males in every way, and so they were free to do with them as they pleased. As unfair as it was, it had been like this since the beginning of time, and it would always remain like this. There was nothing that you or anyone else could do to change that fact.

Then you saw them... A group of people exposed by the latest crushed building and running away from Luna. But these weren't just just any people... These ones were your closest friends. Luna took a step towards them, eagerly spotting the sizable group awaiting crushing. As you saw her foot looming over all of the people you cared about the most, ready to kill them all at once, you couldn't hold it back anymore.

"Please no!!" You cried out from your helpless position.

Much to your surprise, the giantess stopped just short of crushing them.

"What was that slave? What makes these little bugs different from the others? Are they... Oh, these ones are your friends, aren't they?" She smiled evilly, "Then maybe I should do something special, just for them!"

Your plea backfired. In a simple motion Luna flicked her sandals off, each of them landing ahead of your friends and blocking their path. The giantess approached the cornered group and raised a single foot, toes wiggling playfully in anticipation of what was to come. You couldn't bear to look, but you had no choice. Your captor made extra sure that you were watching for this. Each of your friends looked up with an expression of sheer terror as they saw their death staring them in the face. They were trapped now. They could only stare at the bringer of their death like a deer caught in the headlights. It truly was a pitiful sight. There really was nothing they could do now, and they knew it. Mere minutes ago they were going about their lives as usual, never suspecting that this day would be their last. Now this little girl had captured them, and she was going to kill them for no reason other than for her own sadistic pleasure.

"Bye bye, buggies!" Luna giggled as her foot lowered.

It couldn't have lasted more than a couple seconds, but it felt like an eternity in itself. Using the ball of her foot Luna crushed two of your friends immediately.

"James! Luke!" You cried out their names.

Behind you, you could hear a snicker from Luna as she heard your screams. Her foot raised itself again and this time her big toe came down on a third friend: Eric. His remains made a splash beneath Luna's toe as she finally approached the last friend. Your best friend, the one you had known for your entire life and cared about more than anything else in the world, Dylan.

"Dylan run!" You screamed, despite knowing there was no way he could run.

Dylan seemed to know that as well. His look wasn't a happy one, but it was one of acceptance. He was about to die here, and he knew it. There was no point in struggling anymore. After all, there was nothing a male could do to stop a female from having her way. They were the superior beings in the world, and their will was law. Your kind was just unfortunate enough to be placed at the bottom of the food chain. As much as it disgusted you, this was the natural order of the world. One last time, Luna raised her foot and positioned the sole over him. A single step later and it was done. Luna made sure to grind on the remains for full effect. You wanted to cry, to scream curses, to hurt the ones who did this, for everything to just end. Below were the remains of all of your closest friends. They were all gone now. Just like that.

"I think we crushed everyone Luna!" One of her friends called out.

"Not everyone." She shook her head, "I picked up a new slave!"

"Again? Didn't the last one not do his job?"

"That's why I'm going to test him before I take him home. Duh!" Luna made a face at her friend and looked back at you. "Okay little guy, do as I say and we're all good. Don't, and you know what'll happen."

She placed you on the ground before her bare feet. Each green painted toe was coated in the debris of everything you'd ever known. Which is why the order sounded just too cruel to fathom.

"Lick my feet clean."

What? It wasn't surprising, Luna had a reputation of getting footslaves. But this... You stared at her feet. Your friends blood was still dripping off of her feet! The debris of buildings and people coated her soles. To clean this would be unimaginable. But not doing so meant death.

You...
153332.title: Enslaved by Luna

choices: You've done a good enough job, so she let's move onto the second.
You failed her test and must suffer her punishment.
She thinks of a better idea for what to do with you.
1533321.content:
You realize you have no choice but to lick off the blood and debris from her foot. You hesitantly lean forward to stick your face against her foot but keep your body away, but she molds it around you entire body around her sole. You lick for several minutes, getting some of it off, but the shear quantity is too much.

After a few minutes she inspects the her foot to see how you've done.
1533321.title: Foot Licking

1533322.content:
"No way!" You shouted boldly. "Well if you won't clean them, then you might as well become another stain on them!" Lauren giggled.
The massive foot rose above you and you could see the body's and blood coating her soft sole. Then the foot started moving towards you. The sole rested upon you and blood smeared across your face. "Bye bug!" Suddenly you felt a massive pressure as the soft sole, turned rock hard. You felt you chest collapse and your blood and remains gushed out to pleasure her sole.
1533322.title: Refuse and Await Death

info.brief_description: Imagine what the world would be like if ALL females were 100 feet tall...
info.description:
This is a story of what the world would be like if the entire female population was 100 feet tall. Men are still normal sized, and interact together with giantesses on a daily basis. The massive size of these girls is nothing out of the ordinary. The relationship between the two genders will be decided on in chapter 1. The girls could either be evil and oppressive to the much smaller boys, treat them kindly and respect them as equals, or anything in between.

There are really no rules...

I've decided that it was probably a mistake to not leave a clear set of rules for people to add. The additions thus far have been pretty good, but I have had to edit out a few things that weren't to my liking. To keep this from becoming an issue in the future, I will institute an official list of rules for this story!

Here are the new rules:

1) No male giants

2) Don't suddenly stray from the chosen route. There are always a few oddballs in society who don't follow the crowd, so I will allow a few gentle girls in the evil routes without explanation (and vice versa). However, please be clear on one thing: I want these type of people to be very rare in the story, and I don't want the story to begin centering around them!

3) If you do decide to include one of those oddball giantesses, let's make a few things clear: Like in real life, oddballs don't exactly fit in that well. This means that they will likely be seen and treated as an outcast by the other giantesses. However, just like in real life, there is also nothing legally wrong with being an oddball. Unless they actually did something else wrong, they can't just be captured by other girls and punished by the law.

4) The giantesses don't have any super powers. This is supposed to be a story about what it would be like if girls were that size to begin with. They didn't all spontaneously grow due to some freak retro-virus or something, this is just normal for them. As such, please don't have them do anything that a normal girl wouldn't be able to do... Well, other than being 100 feet tall, anyway...

5) No gay content. Lesbian is okay.

6) Please try to use proper grammar and spelling. I will edit chapters to help them conform to this rule, but if it is too messy for even me to read, then it's gone!

7) I will allow foul language TO A DEGREE. This means once, maybe twice per chapter! I don't want to see cursing in every other sentence!

8) Please put spaces between your paragraphs/quotes so that you chapters don't look like one big wall of text. See any chapters that I've written to see what I mean. I will also edit to fix this rule, but please make things easier on me by just doing it right in the first place!

9) Just to be clear, there are no 'normal sized' girls. All females are giantesses. And it's not the men that are small, It's the girls that are big. Men are normal sized compared to real life, and girls are all around 100 feet tall (more or less based on their age).

10) No shrinking the women, either. The whole point of this story is that ALL girls are supposed to be giantesses. If we start adding in shrunken women, then that completely defeats the purpose of the story.

11) The technological advances in this society are similar to modern day technology. Perhaps slightly more advanced.



In order to improve the reading experience, I'll try to correct any spelling and grammar mistakes I find. I also reserve the right to make minor alterations to chapters if it is necessary to insert detail or correct one of the above rules being broken. If a chapter is too poorly written for me to fix, then it will be deleted. Chapters that I have to delete will not qualify for the GP reward.


That is all...
info.pretty_title: A Journey to the Giantess Universe
